Key Match Events: Virat Kohli and K.L. Rahul's 165-run partnership rescued India from a precarious three wickets for two runs
India won by six wickets, posting 201 for four in 41.2 overs
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the M.A. Chidambaram Stadium in Chennai
Others: Ishan Kishan was dismissed early in India's chase
